summary: Added complete roadmap to FIGMA_MCP_SETUP_REPORT.md and started implementation. Installed Figma-Linux via snap successfully. Created Local Bridge Server structure with Node.js/Express that acts as intermediary between Figma Plugin and MCP Server. Bridge server includes HTTP endpoints for document info, selection, join channel, and frames. Server connects to existing MCP WebSocket server on port 3055 and exposes HTTP API on port 3056.
current_status: Figma-Linux installed. Bridge Server created and ready. Next steps: test bridge server connection to MCP, create Figma Plugin, and configure Cursor MCP integration.
